name: Creamy Honey Mustard Tuna Corn Salad
description: Indulge in a high-protein, high-sodium delight with our Creamy Honey Mustard Tuna Corn Salad. This healthified recipe transforms simple, nutritious ingredients into a flavorful salad that's perfect for those seeking wholesome yet hearty dishes. The creamy honey mustard dressing, combined with the richness of tuna and the sweetness of corn, creates a satisfying meal that's both flavorful and beneficial.
recipeIngredient: 0.50  ear small (5-1/2" to 6-1/2" long), Corn, sweet, white, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Ice Berg Lettuce under cold water and chop it into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the Tuna Fillet In Water and flake it into a mixing bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the corn ear for 7 minutes. Once cool, cut the kernels off the cob.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the All-Bran Regular into smaller pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Soften the Cream Cheese Wedge and mix it with 10 g of mustard and 1 packet of Sugar Substitute to create the honey mustard dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the lettuce, flaked tuna, corn kernels, and crumbled All-Bran in a salad bowl. Drizzle with the creamy honey mustard dressing and toss until everything is evenly coated. Serve immediately. Cooking time: 7 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
